bibl.title: Draft of letter by Laura Armistead Carter to the National Cyclopedia of American Biography, [December, 1931?]

div1.p: Laura Carter sends the requested corrections to her father's biographical sketch and notes that there will be no charge to her for its inclusion in the publication.

div1.head: Draft of letter by Laura Armistead Carter to the National Cyclopedia of American Biography, [December, 1931?]
div1.p:
The corrections in this biographic
sketch of my Father (Henry Rose Carter seem to 1812-1925) are made, at request of Mr. F. B.
Rain, Associate Editor, The Next. Cyclopedia
of Biography and it is involve no finan
with the assurance that neither the
corrections, nor the publication of the
biographic sketch itself involve
any pecuniary obligation on my
part. I

I regret that I cannot consider the
publication of a portrait.
